page.title: 18Morris Dancing.
page.content: My dad is a Morris dancer.He is in a Morris team called the Carnbrea Morris.Morris has been a tradition for hundreds of years and it is very enjoyable to see.My father wears a costume when he dances,a white shirt,white long socks,black shoes,red and yellow baldricks and blue breeches.He also has a hat decorated with red and yellow ribbons,badges and flowers.They perform a number of dances which are all slightly different and the last one is always a dance called the Bonny Green Garters. This is one that anyone can join in with and usually everybody does.On Boxing Day we all go to watch my father dance at the local pub and then we go to other people's places and have parties,that's a great day.Usually Carnbrea dancers perform during the evening at two venues.
